UPDATE port_speed_history_blank
switch_port= #{portSpeedHistoryBlank.switchPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_start= #{portSpeedHistoryBlank.timeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select: select time_start, time_end, latest from port_speed_history_blank where switch_port = #{portSpeedHistoryBlank.switchPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT port_speed_history_blank.id, port_speed_history_blank.switch_port, port_speed_history_blank.time_start, port_speed_history_blank.time_end, port_speed_history_blank.latest FROM port_speed_history_blank WHERE port_speed_history_blank.latest = 1
SELECT port_speed_history_blank.id, port_speed_history_blank.time_start FROM port_speed_history_blank WHERE time_start <= #{portSpeedHistoryBlank.timeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
